com.phunware.locationmessaging.location

Interface LocationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleLocationListener

    public interface LocationListener
    Used for receiving notifications from the LocationManager when the user enters or exits a monitored location, or when locations are added, removed or modified from the manager. These methods are called if the LocationListener has been added to the LocationManager via the LocationManager.addLocationListener(LocationListener) method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onZoneAdded(Long id)
      Called when a new Geozone is added to the LocationManager.
      void onZoneCheckIn(Long id)
      Informs this listener that the given Geozone has been checked in successfully.
      void onZoneCheckInFailure(Long id)
      Informs this listener that the given Geozone has been checked in with failure.
      void onZoneEntered(Long id)
      Called when the user enters a Geozone.
      void onZoneExited(Long id)
      Called when the user exits a Geozone.
      void onZoneRemoved(Long id)
      Called when a Geozone is deleted from the LocationManager.
      void onZoneUpdated(Long id)
      Called when a Geozone is modified in the LocationManager.

    • Method Detail

      • onZoneAdded

        void onZoneAdded(Long id)
        Called when a new Geozone is added to the LocationManager.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of geofence that was added.

      • onZoneUpdated

        void onZoneUpdated(Long id)
        Called when a Geozone is modified in the LocationManager.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of geofence that was added.

      • onZoneRemoved

        void onZoneRemoved(Long id)
        Called when a Geozone is deleted from the LocationManager.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of geofence that was added.

      • onZoneEntered

        void onZoneEntered(Long id)
        Called when the user enters a Geozone.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of geofence that was added.

      • onZoneExited

        void onZoneExited(Long id)
        Called when the user exits a Geozone.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of geofence that was added.

      • onZoneCheckIn

        void onZoneCheckIn(Long id)
        Informs this listener that the given Geozone has been checked in successfully.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of the geofence that was exited (should never be null)

      • onZoneCheckInFailure

        void onZoneCheckInFailure(Long id)
        Informs this listener that the given Geozone has been checked in with failure.
        Parameters:
        id - The database id of the geofence that was exited (should never be null)
